prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: Book language has two variants: flat (a prompt with no structure) and full (structured with tasks, commands, and prompts). It uses .book file extension and UTF-8 non-BOM encoding.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}
